languages.text: {n}Строгость на лице девушки обнажается глубокой усталостью.{/n} "Простите, {name}. Сейчас я и сама себя не понимаю. Ваши слова и внимание напомнили мне о жизни на станции. О Теобальде и Фелеке. Не понимаю... Они были просто хранителями Эурак-V, так почему от воспоминаний об этих двоих я испытываю странную тяжесть... вот здесь?" {n}Кассия растерянно касается нагрудника.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Строгость на лице девушки обнажается глубокой усталостью.{/n} "Простите, {name}. Сейчас я и сама себя не понимаю. Ваши слова и внимание напомнили мне о жизни на станции. О Теобальде и Фелеке. Не понимаю... Они были просто хранителями Эурак-V, так почему от воспоминаний об этих двоих я испытываю странную тяжесть... вот здесь?" {n}Кассия растерянно касается нагрудника в бласти сердца.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihre formelle Fassade bröckelt und gibt den Blick auf eine große Müdigkeit darunter frei.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, {name}. Ich verstehe mich im Moment selbst nicht. Eure Worte und Eure Aufmerksamkeit haben mich an das Leben auf der Station erinnert. An Theobald und Felek. Ich verstehe es nicht ... Sie waren lediglich die Hüter von Eurac V, warum lösen Erinnerungen an die beiden also so eine merkwürdige Schwere aus ... genau hier?" {n}Sie legt sich eine Hand auf die Brustplatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre formelle Fassade bröckelt und gibt den Blick auf eine große Müdigkeit darunter frei.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, {name}. Ich verstehe mich im Moment selbst nicht. Eure Worte und Eure Aufmerksamkeit haben mich an das Leben auf der Station erinnert. An Theobald und Felek. Ich verstehe es nicht ... Sie waren lediglich die Hüter von Eurac V, warum lösen Erinnerungen an die beiden also so eine merkwürdige Schwere aus ... genau hier?" {n}Sie legt sich eine Hand auf die Brustplatte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une brèche s'ouvre dans son attitude guindée, révélant une grande lassitude.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner, {name}. Même moi, j'ai du mal à me comprendre en ce moment. Vos paroles et votre attention m'ont rappelé ma vie à bord de la station. Avec Théobald et Felek. Je ne comprends pas... Ils n'étaient que les gardiens d'Eurac-V, alors pourquoi mes souvenirs d'eux me font-ils ressentir ce poids étrange... là ? » {n}demande-t-elle en posant une main sur son plastron.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une brèche s'ouvre dans son attitude guindée, révélant une grande lassitude.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner, {name}. Même moi, j'ai du mal à me comprendre en ce moment. Vos paroles et votre attention m'ont rappelé ma vie à bord de la station. Avec Théobald et Felek. Je ne comprends pas... Ils n'étaient que les gardiens d'Eurac-V, alors pourquoi mes souvenirs d'eux me font-ils ressentir ce poids étrange... là ? » {n}demande-t-elle en posant une main sur son plastron.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她一本正经的面具悄然碎裂，露出精疲力竭的表情。{/n}“请原谅我，{name}。我现在甚至无法看清我自己。你的话语和关怀让我想起了过去在星站上的生活，想起了西奥巴德和费雷克。我不明白……他们只是欧拉克五号星站的守护者，为什么每当想起他们，我……这里……都会感到如此沉重？”{n}卡西娅捂住了胸口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她一本正经的面具悄然碎裂，露出精疲力竭的表情。{/n}“请原谅我，{name}。我现在甚至无法看清我自己。你的话语和关怀让我想起了过去在星站上的生活，想起了西奥巴德和费雷克。我不明白……他们只是欧拉克五号星的守护者，为什么每当想起他们，我……这里……都会感到如此沉重？”{n}卡西娅捂住了胸口。{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女の取りすました表情にはひびが入り、その下の強い疲労があらわになる。{/n}「どうかお許しください、{name}様。あたくしは今、自分のこともよく分からないのです。{name}様の言葉と態度は、あたくしにステーションでの生活を思い出させます。シオボールドとフェレックです。あたくしには理解できません…彼らはただのユーラック・Vの番人にすぎないのに、なぜこの2つの記憶は、異常に重たいものを感じさせるのでしょう…ここにです。」{n}彼女は手を胸当てに置く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の取りすました表情にはひびが入り、その下の強い疲労があらわになる。{/n}「どうかお許しください、{name}様。あたくしは今、自分のこともよく分からないのです。{name}様の言葉と態度は、あたくしにステーションでの生活を思い出させます。シオボールドとフェレックです。あたくしには理解できません…彼らはただのユーラック・Vの番人にすぎないのに、なぜこの2つの記憶は、異常に重たいものを感じさせるのでしょう…ここにです。」{n}彼女は手を胸当てに置く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sencillez de su expresión se quiebra, revelando un gran cansancio.{/n} «Perdóneme, por favor, {name}. Ahora mismo ni siquiera me entiendo a mí misma. Sus palabras y su atención me han recordado a la vida en la estación. A Theobald y Felek. No lo entiendo... No eran más que los guardianes de Eurac V, así que, ¿por qué sus recuerdos me hacen sentir algo extraño... aquí?». {n}Se pone la mano en el pecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İfadesindeki resmiyet çatırdıyor ve ardındaki büyük yıpranmışlık ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Lütfen bağışla beni {name}. Şu an ben bile kendimi anlayamıyorum. Sözlerin ve gösterdiğin ilgiyle bana istasyondaki yaşamı, Theobald ve Felek'i hatırlattın. Anlayamıyorum... Alt tarafı Eurac V'in Sorumlularıydı. Şimdi neden... O ikisine dair anılar aklıma geldikçe burama bir ağırlık çöküyor?" {n}Bir elini göğüs zırhına koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The primness of her expression cracks, revealing a great weariness beneath.{/n} "Please forgive me, {name}. I cannot even understand myself right now. Your words and attention have reminded me of life on the station. Of Theobald and Felek. I do not understand... They were merely the Keepers of Eurac V, so why do memories of those two make me feel a strange heaviness... here?" {n}She places a hand on her breastplate.{/n}
